branchCategory.name: IDFA, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature, for Europe, Asia and Oceania
branchCategory.description: <p>IDFA series refrigerated air dryers are CE marked for use in Europe and other regions that require this mark.  These 50 Hz models have rated flows up to 883 SCFM (1500 m&sup3;/hr [ANR]).</p>

breadCrumb.name: IDFA, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature, for Europe, Asia and Oceania

branchItem.name: IDFA*E, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Sizes 3~75, Standard Inlet Air Temperature, for Use in Europe, Asia, and Oceania
branchItem.description: <p>Series IDFA*E refrigerated air dryers are suitable for use in aftercooled systems with compressors up to ~100 hp (depending on dew point desired).  These durable units have simple control systems and are easily serviced.</p>

branchItem.name: IDFA, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Standard Inlet Air Temperature for Use in Europe Asia and Oceania
branchItem.description: <p>Series IDFA refrigerated air dryers feature improved ambient (113°F/45°C) and inlet (149°F/65°C) air temperatures as well as improved flow ratings over standard models.  With an improved auto drain and standard dust filter, these units will provide years of reliable service.</p>

branchItem.name: IDFA*F, Refrigerated Air Dryer, Sizes 100~150 Standard Inlet Air Temperature, for Use in Europe, Asia, and Oceania
branchItem.description: <p>Series IDAF*F refrigerated air dryers are larger units with improved ambient (113&deg;F/45&deg;C) and inlet (140&deg;F/60&deg;C) air temperatures.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
